TextLibrary.Text: You have suffered a loss, but Darkhunter still needs your help.
In the distance you see Darkhunter. He is surrounded by Orcs and looks like he could use some help.
You must travel south to Gallia in search of Darkhunter.
Darkhunter was tracking some Orcs near the Ruins of Artum. Try searching there.
Darkhunter is surrounded by Orcs near the Ruins of Artum. He needs your help.
You and Darkhunter have managed to slay the Orcs. You find a small amount of treasure on them.
This Orc carries a Great Axe that can give him an extra turn if he does a lot of damage. He is also slightly stronger than a regular Orc.
